[ANIMATION_SETS]
#--------------------------------------------------------------------
# === LUGI
#lugi	idle S		walk S		slide S		jump S		skid S		run S		run jump S	hold S		kick S		swim S		swim input S	climb S		pipe S	die S	idle B		walk B		duck B		slide B		jump B		skid B		throw B		run B		run jump B	hold B		kick B		swim idle B	swim input B	climb B		pipe B	door B	spin B		bonk B		look up	B	GROW B		SHRINK B	idle F		walk F		duck F		slide F		jump F		skid F		throw F		run F		run jump F	hold F		kick F		swim idle F	swim input F	climb F		pipe F	door F	spin F		idle R 		walk R		wag R		duck R		slide R 	jump R		skid R		throw R		run R		run jump R	fly R		hold R		kick R		swim idle R	swim input R	climb R		pipe R	door R	spin R		pre run B	tail R		pre run S	pre run R	pre run F	idle hold S	idle hold B	idle hold R	idle hold F	bull F		bull ex	jump hold S	run hold S	jump hold B	run hold B	jump hold R	run hold R	jump hold F	run hold F
